title: Human-Robot Interaction Research
description: This project is about investigating how humans and robots can collaborate effectively in dynamic environments.

title: Smart Home Energy Management System
description: This project is about developing an AI-driven system to optimize energy consumption in smart homes.

title: IEEE Quarterly Group Project - Speech Sentiment Analysis
description: This project is about developing a real-time sentiment analysis system for audio inputs using an LSTM-based machine learning model built with PyTorch, deployed locally on a Raspberry Pi Zero.

title: Simulating Optimizers from Scratch Using Python
description: This project is about researching and implementing various optimization algorithms, including Gradient Descent, AdaGrad, RMSProp, AdaDelta, and Adam, while visualizing their performance on arbitrary loss functions.

title: Virtual Reality for Mental Health Therapy
description: This project is about exploring the use of virtual reality environments to support mental health treatment and therapeutic experiences.

title: Quantum Computing for Cryptography
description: This project is about exploring the potential of quantum computing to enhance cryptographic protocols.

title: Blockchain for Secure Supply Chains
description: This project is about implementing blockchain technology to enhance transparency and security in global supply chains.

title: Independent Research in Image Classification with Artificial Intelligence
description: This project is about investigating preprocessing techniques for high-resolution images and methods for enhancing model generalization with limited datasets, culminating in a functional image classification model.

title: Independent Research in Learning to Detect Deepfakes with Facial Landmarks
description: This project is about exploring the effectiveness of using facial landmarks as features for detecting deepfakes, analyzing different modeling approaches and hyperparameter configurations to evaluate their viability.

title: Independent Research in Artificial Intelligence and Its Applications in Physics
description: This project is about simulating mechanical interactions and training an LSTM model to predict future frames in dynamic systems, enabling the completion of simulations based on partial input data.

title: Autonomous Drone Navigation System
description: This project is about designing an AI-based navigation system for drones to operate autonomously in complex environments.

title: AI-Powered Agriculture Optimization
description: This project is about developing machine learning models to optimize crop yield predictions and irrigation strategies.
